key_differences.interpretation: The high ambition scenario reduces cumulative emissions by 450 Mt CO2e (12%) compared to baseline
The scenario achieves net-zero by 2048, whereas baseline never reaches net-zero within the simulation period
Achieving the emissions reduction requires 25% more capital investment ($2.5B additional)
Despite higher investment, average electricity prices are 7% lower due to cheaper renewable generation

assumption_changes.rationale: High ambition carbon pricing pathway aligned with 1.5Â°C target
Accelerated electrolyser cost reduction from manufacturing scale-up
